title: Asymptotics of the partial $n$-fold dimer model
abstract:
We study a model of colored multiwebs, which generalizes the dimer model to
allow each vertex to be adjacent to $n_v$ edges. These objects can be
formulated as a random tiling of a graph with partial dimer covers. We examine
the case of a cycle graph, and in particular we describe the local correlations
of tiles in this setting.
